code: import React from'react';import{Box,Header,Cards,Link}from'@cloudscape-design/components';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const projects=[{name:'LLM Based- Financial Research Tool',description:'Working on automating financial research analytics for evaluating pricing posiiton of a company leveraging LLMs. Exploring conversation chains and LLM agents in langchain.
